examples: Acrocephalus palniensis Mukerjee in Notes Bot. Gard. Edinburgh, 19: 303 (1938). Polygala carnosa Mukerjee in J. Bombay Nat. Hist. Soc., 51: 525 (1953).
source: IK db. Labiatae and Polygalaceae specialist. Date from Index Herb.: 172 (1990).  See also Bibliogr. Indology, 2(2): 124 (1965), as 'Mukherji'.  Year of death from Subir Bandyopadhyay.
